actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

summary.text: Designates the following Members of the House of Representatives to the specified committees: (1) Chester G. Atkins, of Massachusetts, to the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs; (2) Jim Chapman, of Texas, to the Committee on Science and Technology; and (3) Michael A. Andrews, of Texas, to the Committee on Ways and Means.

titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.
